title: Kiss of Crimson
description: BOUND BY BLOOD AND DARK SECRETS. CAPTIVE TO DANGER AND INFINITE PLEASURE...Dante comes to Tess more dead than alive. As she struggles to save him, she is unaware that this towering black-clad stranger is no man at all but one of the vampire warrior Breed. With one reckless, irresistible kiss, Tess is dragged into Dante's shifting, shadowed world, where bands of Rogue vampires cut a swathe of terror. There is no place in Dante's dark world for Tess - yet his touch has awakened in her a hunger she never knew she possessed. Bonded by blood, together they must strive to thwart the deadliest of enemies.
author: Lara Adrian
